1: bananas are berries, but strawberries are not.
2: Honey never spoils; archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3000 years old and still edible.
3: Octopuses have three hearts and blue blood.
4: A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.'
5: Wombat poop is cube-shaped, which helps it stay in place and mark territory.
6: Cows have best friends and can become stressed when they are separated.
7: The shortest war in history lasted only 38 to 45 minutes between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896.
8: A jiffy is an actual unit of time; it refers to 1/100th of a second.
9: The inventor of the Pringles can is buried in one.
10: A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus due to its slow rotation on its axis.
11: Did you know? : I can't do a backflip :(
